description: Yusa is an operator in the http://anidb.net/ch15364 [SSS] who conveys the state of the battlefield to http://anidb.net/ch12092 [Yuri]. She is a calm and gentle mannered girl with a straightforward character. Much like http://anidb.net/ch12093 [Tenshi], she does not express her emotions and is called scary by http://anidb.net/ch12094 [Otonashi] and http://anidb.net/ch15355 [Hinata]. She cannot calm down without her earphone. She rarely talks, and she sometimes hurts others` feelings even though she does not mean it.
name: Yusa
